categories: Category:Military personnel of the Sith Empire

nodes.text: Jaral was a male Human who was a major in the Imperial Military of the Sith Empire during the Cold War and Galactic War against the Galactic Republic, when he was stationed on Vaiken Spacedock.

Major Jaral appeared in the video game Star Wars: The Old Republic, released by BioWare in 2011, as the Balmorra Equipment Commendations vendor on Vaiken Spacedock; he was later relabeled as the Level 14 Modification Vendor. Jaral was later removed from the game along with the rest of the planetary Equipment Commendations vendors in Game Update 4.0 on October 20, 2015.
